main_definition: To ask someone to join an event, activity, or gathering.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To request someone's presence at a social event
meanings_and_examples.example: She decided to invite her friends over for a birthday party.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To extend an offer or proposal, often formally
meanings_and_examples.example: The company will invite bids from interested suppliers for their new project.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To encourage someone to participate in a specific activity
meanings_and_examples.example: He was eager to invite his colleagues to try the newly opened restaurant.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To include or make available for participation, involvement, or access
meanings_and_examples.example: The online platform will invite user feedback on its new features.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To draw someone in to a particular group or interest
meanings_and_examples.example: Her warm personality invited people from all walks of life into her circle of friends.
